players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We need to vote them out immediately."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I investigated her last night and she's the mafioso trying to frame me."
You: "Both Diana and Charlie claim to be detective. Only one can be true. We need to hear from both before voting."
Charlie: "Diana is clearly lying. I have the real detective report. Alice, trust me and vote Diana with me."
You: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why didn't you share your investigation result first? Diana spoke up immediately while you only responded defensively. This looks suspicious."

Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso - he killed Bob last night and is now desperately trying to frame me. Notice how he only claimed to be detective AFTER I revealed my investigation, and he can't explain why he didn't speak first if he really had evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.

You: "Charlie is the mafioso - he killed Bob last night and is now desperately trying to frame me. Notice how he only claimed to be detective AFTER I revealed my investigation, and he can't explain why he didn't speak first if he really had evidence."
